body_html: Are we certain that users don't want the additional reproducibilty of saving this list of filenames in the checkpoint? If it isn't saved, you might run this again and get a different answer and be surprised that suddenly your training is behaving differently.
body_text: Are we certain that users don't want the additional reproducibilty of saving this list of filenames in the checkpoint?  If it isn't saved, you might run this again and get a different answer and be surprised that suddenly your training is behaving differently.
body: Are we certain that users don't want the additional reproducibilty of saving this list of filenames in the checkpoint?  If it isn't saved, you might run this again and get a different answer and be surprised that suddenly your training is behaving differently.
